languages.text: "Ксеносы, что напали на Даргонус, не уважают смерть. Они издеваются над ней, превращают акт убийства в насмешку".
"The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."
languages.original_text: "Ксеносы, что напали на Даргонус, не уважают смерть. Они издеваются над ней, превращают акт убийства в насмешку".

traits.locale_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Die Xenos, die Dargonus angegriffen haben, haben keinerlei Respekt vor dem Tod. Sie verspotten ihn und machen den Akt des Tötens zur Farce."
languages.original_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."

traits.locale_text: "Die Xenos, die Dargonus angegriffen haben, haben keinerlei Respekt vor dem Tod. Sie verspotten ihn und machen den Akt des Tötens zur Farce."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Les xénos qui ont attaqué Dargonus n'ont aucun respect pour la mort. Ils la tournent en ridicule et font de l'art de tuer une véritable mascarade. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."

traits.locale_text: « Les xénos qui ont attaqué Dargonus n'ont aucun respect pour la mort. Ils la tournent en ridicule et font de l'art de tuer une véritable mascarade. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Los xenos que atacaron Dargonus no tienen respeto a la muerte. Se burlan de ella y convierten el matar en una burla».
languages.original_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."

traits.locale_text: «Los xenos que atacaron Dargonus no tienen respeto a la muerte. Se burlan de ella y convierten el matar en una burla».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスを攻撃した異種族は、死に敬意を表さない。彼らは死を馬鹿にし、殺人行為を冗談だと思っている」
languages.original_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスを攻撃した異種族は、死に敬意を表さない。彼らは死を馬鹿にし、殺人行為を冗談だと思っている」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “那些袭击了达戈努斯的异形根本不尊重死亡。他们嘲弄死亡，将杀戮变成了亵渎。”
languages.original_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."

traits.locale_text: “那些袭击了达戈努斯的异形根本不尊重死亡。他们嘲弄死亡，将杀戮变成了亵渎。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "The xenos that attacked Dargonus have no respect for death. They ridicule it and turn the act of killing into a mockery."
